body: Now to be serious....I have tried to look at my stats on the website, but for some reason it wont show up, any clue why it wont let me?
body_tagged: Now to be serious....I have tried to look at my stats on the website, but for some reason it wont show up, any clue why it wont let me?
title: Stats profile

replies.body: It's a glitch with newer players. You can find yourself on the leaderboard if that helps
replies.body_tagged: It's a glitch with newer players. You can find yourself on the leaderboard if that helps

replies.body: New users are unable to view their stats on their main profile page, try http://avicus.net/Minerman861999/stats
